trigger_description: This Trigger monitors changes in your thermostat's measured temperature and fires if it exceeds a certain threshold.
This Trigger fires if the thermostat encounters an error.

trigger: Current set temperature exceeds a threshold
trigger_description: This Trigger monitors changes in your thermostat's set temperature and fires if it exceeds a certain threshold.
This Trigger monitors changes in your thermostat's heating mode and fires if it is set to a certain mode.
This Trigger monitors changes in your thermostat's set temperature and fires whenever it changes.
